public class LadyBirdManager
extends java.lang.Thread

The class managers the ladybirds on the farm.

markLadyBirdAt

public void markLadyBirdAt(int x,
                           int y)
Marks the ladybird at the position described by x and y. If there is not any ladybird at position or the ladybird is the same as the old marked ladybird the marked ladybird variable is set to null.

Parameters:
x - The X coordinate.
y - The Y coordinate.

isLadyBirdAt

public boolean isLadyBirdAt(int x,
                            int y)
Checks if there is a ladybird at the position specified by x and y.

Parameters:
x - The X coordinate.
y - The Y coordinate.
Returns:
True if it is one there.

getMarkedLadyBird

public LadyBird getMarkedLadyBird()
Gets the marked ladybird.

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Draws the ladybirds and a white border around the marked ladybird.
